infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Presient uses Health data for enhanced biometric authentication and fallback support. Heart rate data improves accuracy and provides backup authentication when the primary sensor is unavailable.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Presient accesses heart rate data to improve authentication accuracy and enable dual-sensor biometric matching with Apple Watch.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Presient uses the camera to capture heart rate data for biometric authentication.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Presient may use microphone for enhanced biometric data collection.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Presient uses location to enhance security and provide context for presence detection.

plugins.healthSharePermission: This app needs access to read heart rate data for enhanced biometric authentication and dual-sensor support with Apple Watch.
plugins.healthUpdatePermission: This app accesses heart rate data to improve authentication accuracy with Apple Watch integration.

plugins.cameraPermission: Presient uses camera for heart rate detection and biometric authentication.
